name: places/ChIJyUY4zOdZwokRHxjEO8yukSo
formattedAddress: 51 Astor Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 51 Astor Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
CycleBar NoHo has spin classes where you ride to the beat with one arms song (option of 4lb weight bar or 6lb weight bar). They have a leaderboard that compares your stats to the rest of the class, but you can choose to not be shown on the board if you'd like. Shoes, towels, and showers are available for no cost! Bring your own water or buy one at the studio.

Most instructors at the NoHo location do less choreography than SoulCycle, and it's overall more beginner-friendly, not as hard as other studios.

originalText.text: First ever cycling class, and Angie made it super engaging and smooth for a beginner! Class was def very challenging and you get a fantastic workout in

text.text: First ever cycling class, and Angie made it super engaging and smooth for a beginner! Class was def very challenging and you get a fantastic workout in

originalText.text: I'm obsessed with cyclebar. It's been almost a year now since I had my first class at cyclebar and I will never leave. I am a very uncommitted person when it comes to sticking to my workout routine, but I've fallen in love with this place. The staff is friendly, warm, welcoming, and helpful. The studio is always spotless, and the bathrooms / showers have great amenities. And don't even get me started on the instructors. These instructions are world-class. They have the funnest themed rides, and some instructors are the best djs! I listen to Chloes spotify playlists from class all the time outside of class because she's got the best playlists ever! When I had knee surgery and came back to classes for the first time after a month off, my instructors were super attentive and encouraging (thank you Abby and Chloe!). And finally, the instructors make space for everyone, people of all levels. There are always options in class to go the harder route, or just chill and give your body a break. I love you cyclebar!

originalText.text: I just started at CycleBar and am loving it. But more than that what an incredibly friendly and helpful staff, the manager Betty was so helpful in getting my membership set up with a program through my insurance and was so communicative through the whole process. Thank you, CycleBar NoHo!

originalText.text: Classes are great but also super impressed by the people at the front desk so kind and accommodating!
